titleStmt.title: An history of angells being a theologicall treatise of our communion and warre with them : handled on the 6th chapter of the Ephesians, the 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18 verses / by Henry Lawrence ...
Of our communion and warre with angels
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, Henry, 1600-1664.
Milton, John, 1608-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. and are to be sold by William Nealand ...,

notesStmt.note: The author was assisted in this work by John Milton.
Appeared as: Of our communion and warre with angels. 1646.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
